item.title: The Salty, Soothing Twist of Pretzels
item.description: Baked in Germany since the Middle Ages, the treats crossed the Atlantic with 19th-century immigrants to become an all-American favorite.

item.title: Confession of a Failed Steps Fanatic
item.description: I’d like to be one of those people who always gets in 15,000 steps a day, but maybe there’s a downside to being too briskly efficient.

item.title: Hamas Has Deadlier Weapons Than the Last Time Israel Invaded Gaza
item.description: Militant group returned in force with drones, homegrown missiles and fortified tunnels; “they are armed to the teeth.”

item.title: Bankman-Fried is staring down a lengthy prison sentence after being convicted of fraud in FTX's collapse, and he faces long odds of making inroads on appeal.
item.description: Bankman-Fried is staring down a lengthy prison sentence after being convicted of fraud in FTX’s collapse, and he faces long odds of making inroads on appeal.

item.title: Job growth slowed sharply last month, a sign the U.S. economy is cooling this fall after a torrid summer. Employers added 150,000 jobs in October, half the prior month's gain.
item.description: Job growth slowed sharply last month, a sign the U.S. economy is cooling this fall after a torrid summer. Employers added 150,000 jobs in October, half the prior month’s gain.

item.title: The Supreme Court said it would decide two gun-related cases, adding to a docket that already includes a major follow-up to its 2022 opinion curbing gun regulations.
item.description: The Supreme Court said it would decide two gun-related cases, adding to a docket that already includes a major follow-up to its 2022 opinion curbing gun regulations.

item.title: Virginia Gov. Youngkin has put all his political capital on the line in Tuesday's statehouse elections, hoping to prove that a bluish state can be persuaded to go for conservative governance and restrictions on abortion.
item.description: Virginia Gov. Youngkin has put all his political capital on the line in Tuesday’s statehouse elections, hoping to prove that a bluish state can be persuaded to go for conservative governance and restrictions on abortion.

item.title: Hezbollah's leader warned that a regional war with Israel was a realistic possibility, as fears grew that the conflict in Gaza could spill into a second battlefront with the Lebanese militant group.
item.description: Hezbollah’s leader warned that a regional war with Israel was a realistic possibility, as fears grew that the conflict in Gaza could spill into a second battlefront with the Lebanese militant group.

item.title: Israel's prime minister rejected U.S. pressure for a pause in Israel's strikes on Hamas after Blinken urged more actions to protect civilians in Gaza.
item.description: Israel’s prime minister rejected U.S. pressure for a pause in Israel’s strikes on Hamas after Blinken urged more actions to protect civilians in Gaza.

item.title: Can Glenn Youngkin Pull Off Another Magic Trick in Virginia?
item.description: The GOP governor is making a pitch for abortion restrictions and conservative governance in his bluish state’s off-year election.

item.title: Jeff Bezos says he is moving to Miami, where he'll be near his parents.
item.description: Jeff Bezos says he is moving to Miami, where he’ll be near his parents.

item.title: Some Citigroup credit-card customers are being told by the bank to enroll in paperless billing to continue using their account online.
item.description: Some Citigroup credit-card customers are being told by the bank to enroll in paperless billing to continue using their account online.

item.title: A.P. Moller-Maersk said it would cut more than 10,000 jobs, as a pandemic-fueled cargo boom has ended.
item.description: A.P. Moller-Maersk said it would cut more than 10,000 jobs, as a pandemic-fueled cargo boom has ended.

item.title: Amazon, Google and Microsoft have invested billions of dollars in AI startups while also charging those fledgling companies a similar amount to use their cloud platforms.
item.description: Amazon, Google and Microsoft have invested billions of dollars in AI startups while also charging those fledgling companies a similar amount to use their cloud platforms.

item.title: The S&P 500 rallied Friday, capping its best weekly performance since November 2022. The broad index, Dow and Nasdaq gained 0.9%, 0.7% and 1.4%, respectively.
item.description: The S&P 500 rallied Friday, capping its best weekly performance since November 2022. The broad index, Dow and Nasdaq gained 0.9%, 0.7% and 1.4%, respectively.

item.title: Trump has been released, at least for now, from a limited gag order in the federal prosecution alleging that he conspired to overturn the 2020 election results.
item.description: Trump has been released, at least for now, from a limited gag order in the federal prosecution alleging that he conspired to overturn the 2020 election results.

item.title: Football Coaching Analyst at Center of Michigan Sign-Stealing Scandal Resigns
item.description: Connor Stalions left the team on Friday. He reportedly purchased tickets to games of Michigan’s future opponents, a potential violation of NCAA rules, as part of a sign-stealing scheme.
